weekIdentifier.description: The school label for the week.

endDate.description: The end date for the academic week.

totalInstructionalDays.description: The total instructional days during the academic week.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Account
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This financial entity represents a funding source combined with its purpose and type of transaction. It provides a formal record of the debits and credits relating to the specific account.

accountIdentifier.description: The alphanumeric string that identifies the account.

accountClassificationDescriptor.description: The type of account code associated with the account.

accountCodeNumber.description: An account code defined for the education accounting system by the education organization.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The identifier assigned to an education organization.

accountName.description: A descriptive name for the account.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Assessment
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents a tool, instrument, process, or exhibition composed of a systematic sampling of behavior for measuring a student's competence, knowledge, skills, or behavior. An assessment can be used to measure differences in individuals or groups and changes in performance from one occasion to the next.

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

assessmentTitle.description: The title or name of the Assessment.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

assessmentIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A coding scheme that is used for identification and record-keeping purposes by schools, social services, or other agencies to refer to an assessment.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the assessment identification code.

assessmentCategoryDescriptor.description: The category of an assessment based on format and content. For example:        Achievement test        Advanced placement test        Alternate assessment/grade-level standards        Attitudinal test        Cognitive and perceptual skills test        ...

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the administrator of the assessment uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as performance level descriptors or a quantitative method such as a numerical grade or cut score. More than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score possible on the assessment.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score possible on the assessment.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

performanceLevelDescriptor.description: The performance level(s) defined for the assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the instructor of the class uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or numerical grade. In some cases, more than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to make the indicated level of performance.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score to make the indicated level of performance.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

title.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

author.description: The person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual content of the standard.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the standards using a network-resolvable URI.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

publicationStatusDescriptor.description: The publication status of the document (i.e., Adopted, Draft, Published, Deprecated, Unknown).

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

beginDate.description: The beginning of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

endDate.description: The end of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

assessmentForm.description: Identifies the form of the assessment, for example a regular versus makeup form, multiple choice versus constructed response, etc.

assessmentVersion.description: The version identifier for the assessment.

revisionDate.description: The month, day, and year that the conceptual design for the assessment was most recently revised substantially.

maxRawScore.description: The maximum raw score achievable across all assessment items that are correct and scored at the maximum.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for Assessment.

assessmentPeriodDescriptor.description: The period of time in which an assessment is supposed to be administered (e.g., Beginning of Year, Middle of Year, End of Year).

beginDate.description: The first date the assessment is to be administered.

endDate.description: The last date the assessment is to be administered.

assessmentFamily.description: The AssessmentFamily this Assessment is a member of.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programName.description: The formal name of the Program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

adaptiveAssessment.description: Indicates that the assessment is adaptive.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.AssessmentItem
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents one of many single measures that make up an assessment.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a space, room, site, building, individual, organization, program, or institution by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

assessmentItemCategoryDescriptor.description: Category or type of the AssessmentItem. For example:        Multiple choice        Analytic        Prose        ...

maxRawScore.description: The maximum raw score achievable across all assessment items that are correct and scored at the maximum.

responseValue.description: The response value, often an option number or code value (e.g., 1, 2, A, B, true, false).

responseDescription.description: Additional text provided to define the response value.

correctResponse.description: The correct response for the AssessmentItem.

expectedTimeAssessed.description: The duration of time allotted for the AssessmentItem.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for AssessmentItem.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

assessmentItemURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the entry in an assessment item bank, which describes this content item.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.BellSchedule
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents the schedule of class period meeting times.

bellScheduleName.description: Name or title of the BellSchedule.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

classPeriodName.description: An indication of the portion of a typical daily session in which students receive instruction in a specified subject (e.g., morning, sixth period, block period, or AB schedules).

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

date.description: The dates for which the BellSchedule applies.

alternateDayName.description: An alternate name for the day (e.g., Red, Blue).

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the bell schedule begins.

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the bell schedule ends.

totalInstructionalTime.description: The total instructional time in minutes per day for the bell schedule.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.ClassPeriod
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents the designation of a regularly scheduled series of class meetings at designated times and days of the week.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

classPeriodName.description: An indication of the portion of a typical daily session in which students receive instruction in a specified subject (e.g., morning, sixth period, block period, or AB schedules).

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time begins.

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time ends.

officialAttendancePeriod.description: Indicator of whether this class period is used for official daily attendance. Alternatively, official daily attendance may be tied to a Section.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.CompetencyObjective
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity holds additional competencies for student achievement that are not associated with specific learning objectives (e.g., paying attention in class).

objective.description: The designated title of the CompetencyObjective.

description.description: The description of the student competency objective.

objectiveGradeLevelDescriptor.description: The grade level for which the CompetencyObjective is targeted.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

successCriteria.description: One or more statements that describes the criteria used by teachers and students to check for attainment of a competency objective. This criteria gives clear indications as to the degree to which learning is moving through the Zone or Proximal Development toward independent achievement of the CompetencyObjective.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Course
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This educational entity represents the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

courseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in a school or other institution or organization. In departmentalized classes at the elementary, secondary, and postsecondary levels (and for staff development activities), this refers to the name by which a course is identified (e.g., American History, English III). For elementary and other non-departmentalized classes, it refers to any portion of the instruction for which a grade or report is assigned (e.g., reading, composition, spelling, and language arts).

numberOfParts.description: The number of parts identified for a course.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a course by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity. For multi-part course codes, concatenate the parts separated by a "/". For example, consider the following SCED code-    subject = 20 Math    course = 272 Geometry    level = G General    credits = 1.00   course sequence 1 of 1- would be entered as 20/272/G/1.00/1 of 1.

courseIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A system that is used to identify the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the Identification Code.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

academicSubjectDescriptor.description: The intended major subject area of the course.

courseDescription.description: A description of the content standards and goals covered in the course. Reference may be made to state or national content standards.

timeRequiredForCompletion.description: The actual or estimated number of clock minutes required for class completion.  This number is especially important for career and technical education classes and may represent (in minutes) the clock hour requirement of the class.

dateCourseAdopted.description: Date the course was adopted by the education agency.

highSchoolCourseRequirement.description: An indication that this course may satisfy high school graduation requirements in the course's subject area.

courseGPAApplicabilityDescriptor.description: An indicator of whether or not the course being described is included in the computation of the student's Grade Point Average, and if so, if it is weighted differently from regular courses.

courseDefinedByDescriptor.description: Specifies whether the course was defined by the SEA, LEA, School, or national organization.

minimumAvailableCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

minimumAvailableCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

minimumAvailableCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

maximumAvailableCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

maximumAvailableCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

maximumAvailableCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

careerPathwayDescriptor.description: Indicates the career cluster or pathway the course is associated with as part of a CTE curriculum.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.

maxCompletionsForCredit.description: Designates how many times the course may be taken with credit received by the student.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.CourseOffering
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents an entry in the course catalog of available courses offered by the school during a session.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

localCourseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in the school, if different from the CourseTitle.

instructionalTimePlanned.description: The planned total number of clock minutes of instruction for this course offering. Generally, this should be at least as many minutes as is required for completion by the related state- or district-defined course.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.
The identifier assigned to a school.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

attemptedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

attemptedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

attemptedCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

earnedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

earnedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

earnedCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course

additionalCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

whenTakenGradeLevelDescriptor.description: Student's grade level at time of course.

methodCreditEarnedDescriptor.description: The method the credits were earned (e.g., Classroom, Examination, Transfer).

finalLetterGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

finalNumericGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

courseRepeatCodeDescriptor.description: Indicates that an academic course has been repeated by a student and how that repeat is to be computed in the student's academic grade average.

jsonSchemaForUpdate.title: Ed-Fi.CourseTranscript
jsonSchemaForUpdate.description: This entity is the final record of a student's performance in their courses at the end of a semester or school year.

courseAttemptResultDescriptor.description: The result from the student's attempt to take the course, for example:        Pass        Fail        Incomplete        Withdrawn.

attemptedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

attemptedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

attemptedCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

earnedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

earnedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

earnedCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course

additionalCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

whenTakenGradeLevelDescriptor.description: Student's grade level at time of course.

methodCreditEarnedDescriptor.description: The method the credits were earned (e.g., Classroom, Examination, Transfer).

finalLetterGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

finalNumericGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

courseRepeatCodeDescriptor.description: Indicates that an academic course has been repeated by a student and how that repeat is to be computed in the student's academic grade average.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The identifier assigned to an education organization.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

termDescriptor.description: The term for the session during the school year.

courseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in a school or other institution or organization. In departmentalized classes at the elementary, secondary, and postsecondary levels (and for staff development activities), this refers to the name by which a course is identified (e.g., American History, English III). For elementary and other non-departmentalized classes, it refers to any portion of the instruction for which a grade or report is assigned (e.g., reading, composition, spelling, language arts).

alternativeCourseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in the school, if different from the CourseTitle.

alternativeCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the school that identifies the course offering, the code from an external educational organization, or other alternate course code.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

externalEducationOrganizationNameOfInsti.description: Name of the external institution where the student completed the course; to be used only when the reference ExternalEducationOrganization is not available.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a course by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity. For multi-part course codes, concatenate the parts separated by a "/". For example, consider the following SCED code-    subject = 20 Math    course = 272 Geometry    level = G General    credits = 1.00   course sequence 1 of 1- would be entered as 20/272/G/1.00/1 of 1.

courseIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A system that is used to identify the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the Identification Code.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the course identification code.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

awardDate.description: The date the partial credits and/or grades were awarded or earned.

earnedCredits.description: The number of credits a student earned for completing a given course.

methodCreditEarnedDescriptor.description: The method the credits were earned.

letterGradeEarned.description: The indicator of student performance as submitted by the instructor.

numericGradeEarned.description: The indicator of student performance as submitted by the instructor.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Credential
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: The legal document giving authorization to perform teaching assignment services.

effectiveDate.description: The year, month and day on which an active credential held by an individual was issued.

endorsement.description: Endorsements are attachments to teaching certificates and indicate areas of specialization.

expirationDate.description: The month, day, and year on which an active credential held by an individual will expire.

credentialFieldDescriptor.description: The field of certification for the certificate (e.g., Mathematics, Music).

credentialIdentifier.description: Identifier or serial number assigned to the credential.

issuanceDate.description: The month, day, and year on which an active credential was issued to an individual.

credentialTypeDescriptor.description: An indication of the category of credential an individual holds.

stateOfIssueStateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the name of the state (within the United States) or extra-state jurisdiction in which a license/credential was issued.

teachingCredentialDescriptor.description: An indication of the category of a legal document giving authorization to perform teaching assignment services.

teachingCredentialBasisDescriptor.description: An indication of the pre-determined criteria for granting the teaching credential that an individual holds.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Credential.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.DisciplineAction
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This event entity represents actions taken by an education organization after a disruptive event that is recorded as a discipline incident.

disciplineActionIdentifier.description: Identifier assigned by the education organization to the DisciplineAction.

disciplineActionLength.description: The length of time in school days for the DisciplineAction (e.g. removal, detention), if applicable.

actualDisciplineActionLength.description: Indicates the actual length in school days of a student's disciplinary assignment.

disciplineActionLengthDifferenceReasonDe.description: Indicates the reason for the difference, if any, between the official and actual lengths of a student's disciplinary assignment.

relatedToZeroTolerancePolicy.description: An indication of whether or not this disciplinary action taken against a student was imposed as a consequence of state or local zero tolerance policies.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

incidentIdentifier.description: A locally assigned unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify each specific DisciplineIncident or occurrence. The same identifier should be used to document the entire DisciplineIncident even if it included multiple offenses and multiple offenders.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.
The identifier assigned to a school.

receivedEducationServicesDuringExpulsion.description: An indication of whether the student received educational services when removed from the regular school program for disciplinary reasons.

iepPlacementMeetingIndicator.description: An indication as to whether an offense and/or disciplinary action resulted in a meeting of a student's Individualized Education Program (IEP) team to determine appropriate placement.

incidentIdentifier.description: A locally assigned unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify each specific DisciplineIncident or occurrence. The same identifier should be used to document the entire DisciplineIncident even if it included multiple offenses and multiple offenders.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.DisciplineIncident
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This event entity represents an occurrence of an infraction ranging from a minor behavioral problem that disrupts the orderly functioning of a school or classroom (such as tardiness) to a criminal act that results in the involvement of a law enforcement official (such as robbery). A single event (e.g., a fight) is one incident regardless of how many perpetrators or victims are involved. Discipline incidents are events classified as warranting discipline action.

incidentIdentifier.description: A locally assigned unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify each specific DisciplineIncident or occurrence. The same identifier should be used to document the entire DisciplineIncident even if it included multiple offenses and multiple offenders.

incidentDate.description: The month, day, and year on which the DisciplineIncident occurred.

incidentTime.description: An indication of the time of day the incident took place.

incidentLocationDescriptor.description: Identifies where the DisciplineIncident occurred and whether or not it occurred on school, for example:        On school        Administrative offices area        Cafeteria area        Classroom        Hallway or stairs        ...

reporterDescriptionDescriptor.description: Information on the type of individual who reported the DisciplineIncident. When known and/or if useful, use a more specific option code (e.g., "Counselor" rather than "Professional Staff"); for example:        Student        Parent/guardian        Law enforcement officer        Nonschool personnel        Representative of visiting school        ...

reporterName.description: Identifies the reporter of the DisciplineIncident by name.

behaviorDetailedDescription.description: Specifies a more granular level of detail of a behavior involved in the incident.

behaviorDescriptor.description: Describes behavior by category and provides a detailed description.

reportedToLawEnforcement.description: Indicator of whether the incident was reported to law enforcement.

caseNumber.description: The case number assigned to the DisciplineIncident by law enforcement or other organization.

incidentCost.description: The value of any quantifiable monetary loss directly resulting from the DisciplineIncident. Examples include the value of repairs necessitated by vandalism of a school facility, or the value of personnel resources used for repairs or consumed by the incident.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

firstName.description: A name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony, or through legal change.

lastSurname.description: The name borne in common by members of a family.

disciplineIncidentParticipationCodeDescr.description: The role or type of participation of a student in a discipline incident; for example: Victim, Perpetrator, Witness, Reporter.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.EducationContent
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents materials for students or teachers that can be used for teaching, learning, research, and more. Education content includes full courses, course materials, modules, intervention descriptions, textbooks, streaming videos, tests, software, and any other tools, materials, or techniques used to support access to knowledge.

contentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the EducationContent.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

shortDescription.description: A short description or name of the entity.

description.description: An extended written representation of the education content.

author.description: The individual credited with the creation of the resource.

additionalAuthorsIndicator.description: Indicates whether there are additional un-named authors. In a research report, this is often marked by the abbreviation "et al".

publisher.description: The organization credited with publishing the resource.

timeRequired.description: Approximate or typical time it takes to work with or through this learning resource for the typical intended target audience.

interactivityStyleDescriptor.description: The predominate mode of learning supported by the learning resource. Acceptable values are active, expositive, or mixed.

contentClassDescriptor.description: The predominate type or kind characterizing the learning resource.

useRightsURL.description: The URL where the owner specifies permissions for using the resource.

contentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the EducationContent.

derivativeSourceLearningResourceMetadata.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

derivativeSourceURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

cost.description: An amount that has to be paid or spent to buy or obtain the EducationContent.

costRateDescriptor.description: The rate by which the cost applies.

namespace.description: Namespace for the EducationContent.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

cost.description: An amount that has to be paid or spent to buy or obtain the EducationContent.

costRateDescriptor.description: The rate by which the cost applies.

namespace.description: Namespace for the EducationContent.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Grade
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This educational entity represents an overall score or assessment tied to a course over a period of time (i.e., the grading period). Student grades are usually a compilation of marks and other scores.

letterGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

numericGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

diagnosticStatement.description: A statement provided by the teacher that provides information in addition to the grade or assessment score.

gradeTypeDescriptor.description: The type of grade reported (e.g., Exam, Final, Grading Period).

performanceBaseConversionDescriptor.description: A conversion of the level to a standard set of performance levels.

beginDate.description: Month, day, and year of the Student's entry or assignment to the Section.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

letterGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance for a learning standard as submitted by the instructor.

numericGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance for a learning standard as submitted by the instructor.

diagnosticStatement.description: A statement provided by the teacher that provides information in addition to the grade or assessment score.

performanceBaseConversionDescriptor.description: A performance level that describes the student proficiency.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.GradebookEntry
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents an assignment, homework, or classroom assessment to be recorded in a gradebook.

gradebookEntryTitle.description: The name or title of the activity to be recorded in the GradebookEntry.

gradebookEntryTypeDescriptor.description: The type of the GradebookEntry; for example, homework, assignment, quiz, unit test, oral presentation, etc.

dateAssigned.description: The date the assignment, homework, or assessment was assigned or executed.

description.description: A description of the assignment, homework, or classroom assessment.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

dueDate.description: The date the assignment, homework, or assessment is due.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.GradingPeriod
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents the time span for which grades are reported.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

endDate.description: Month, day, and year of the last day of the GradingPeriod.

totalInstructionalDays.description: Total days available for educational instruction during the GradingPeriod.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.GraduationPlan
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity is a plan outlining the required credits, credits by subject, credits by course, and other criteria required for graduation. A graduation plan may be one or more standard plans defined by an education organization and/or individual plans for some or all students.

graduationPlanTypeDescriptor.description: The type of academic plan the student is following for graduation: for example, Minimum, Recommended, Distinguished, or Standard.

individualPlan.description: An indicator of whether the GraduationPlan is tailored for an individual.

totalRequiredCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

totalRequiredCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

totalRequiredCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

academicSubjectDescriptor.description: The intended major subject area of the graduation requirement.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

courseSetName.description: Identifying name given to a collection of courses.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

whenTakenGradeLevelDescriptor.description: The grade level when the student is planned to take the course.

creditCategoryDescriptor.description: A categorization for the course transcript credits awarded in the course transcript.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the administrator of the assessment uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as performance level descriptors or a quantitative method such as a numerical grade or cut score. More than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score possible on the assessment.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score possible on the assessment.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

performanceLevelDescriptor.description: The performance level(s) defined for the assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the instructor of the class uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or numerical grade. In some cases, more than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to make the indicated level of performance.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score to make the indicated level of performance.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Intervention
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: An implementation of an instructional approach focusing on the specific techniques and materials used to teach a given subject.

contentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the EducationContent.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

uri.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

interventionClassDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention is used: curriculum, supplement, or practice.

deliveryMethodDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention was implemented: individual, small group, whole class, or whole school.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionPrescriptionIdentificationCo.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention prescription.

beginDate.description: The start date for the intervention implementation.

endDate.description: The end date for the intervention implementation.

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time begins.

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time ends.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention.

minDosage.description: The minimum duration of time in minutes that may be assigned for the intervention.

maxDosage.description: The maximum duration of time in minutes that may be assigned for the intervention.

diagnosisDescriptor.description: Targeted purpose of the intervention (e.g., attendance issue, dropout risk) for which the effectiveness is measured.

populationServedDescriptor.description: Population for which effectiveness is measured.

gradeLevelDescriptor.description: Grade level for which effectiveness is measured.

improvementIndex.description: Along a percentile distribution of students, the improvement index represents the change in an average student's percentile rank that is considered to be due to the intervention.

interventionEffectivenessRatingDescripto.description: An intervention demonstrates effectiveness if the research has shown that the program caused an improvement in outcomes. Values: positive effects, potentially positive effects, mixed effects, potentially negative effects, negative effects, and no discernible effects.

participants.description: The number of participants observed in the study.

deliveryMethodDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention was implemented: individual, small group, whole class, or whole school.

interventionClassDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention is used: curriculum, supplement, or practice.

stateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: An Ed-Fi Descriptor

interventionStudyIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention study.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.LearningObjective
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents identified learning objectives for courses in specific grades.

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

title.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

author.description: The person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual content of the standard.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the standards using a network-resolvable URI.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

publicationStatusDescriptor.description: The publication status of the document (i.e., Adopted, Draft, Published, Deprecated, Unknown).

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

beginDate.description: The beginning of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

endDate.description: The end of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

objective.description: The designated title of the LearningObjective.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for the LearningObjective.

successCriteria.description: One or more statements that describes the criteria used by teachers and students to check for attainment of a learning objective. This criteria gives clear indications as to the degree to which learning is moving through the Zone or Proximal Development toward independent achievement of the LearningObjective.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.
Namespace for the LearningObjective.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.LearningStandard
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: A statement that describes a specific competency or academic standard.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a Learning Standard.

contentStandardName.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

description.description: The text of the statement. The textual content that either describes a specific competency such as "Apply the Pythagorean Theorem to determine unknown side lengths in right triangles in real-world and mathematical problems in two and three dimensions." or describes a less granular group of competencies within the taxonomy of the standards document, e.g. "Understand and apply the Pythagorean Theorem," or "Geometry".

learningStandardItemCode.description: A code designated by the promulgating body to identify the statement, e.g. 1.N.3 (usually not globally unique).

title.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

author.description: The person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual content of the standard.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the standards using a network-resolvable URI.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

publicationStatusDescriptor.description: The publication status of the document (i.e., Adopted, Draft, Published, Deprecated, Unknown).

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

beginDate.description: The beginning of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

endDate.description: The end of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the statement using a network-resolvable URI.

courseTitle.description: The official Course Title with which this learning standard is associated.

successCriteria.description: One or more statements that describes the criteria used by teachers and students to check for attainment of a learning standard. This criteria gives clear indications as to the degree to which learning is moving through the Zone or Proximal Development toward independent achievement of the LearningStandard.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).
The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: The namespace of the organization or entity who governs the standard. It is recommended the namespaces observe a URI format and begin with a domain name under the governing organization or entity control.

learningStandardCategoryDescriptor.description: An additional classification of the type of a specific learning standard.

learningStandardScopeDescriptor.description: Signals the scope of usage the standard. Does not necessarily relate the standard to the governing body.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Location
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents the physical space where students gather for a particular class/section. The Location may be an indoor or outdoor area designated for the purpose of meeting the educational needs of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

classroomIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a room by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

maximumNumberOfSeats.description: The most number of seats the class can maintain.

optimalNumberOfSeats.description: The number of seats that is most favorable to the class.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.ObjectiveAssessment
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents subtests that assess specific learning objectives.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a space, room, site, building, individual, organization, program, or institution by a school, school system, a state, or other agency or entity.

maxRawScore.description: The maximum raw score achievable across all assessment items that are correct and scored at the maximum.

performanceLevelDescriptor.description: The performance level(s) defined for the assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the instructor of the class uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or numerical grade. In some cases, more than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to make the indicated level of performance.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score to make the indicated level of performance.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

percentOfAssessment.description: The percentage of the Assessment that tests this objective.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for this level of ObjectiveAssessment.

description.description: The description of the ObjectiveAssessment (e.g., vocabulary, measurement, or geometry).

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a space, room, site, building, individual, organization, program, or institution by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

namespace.description: Namespace for the Assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the administrator of the assessment uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as performance level descriptors or a quantitative method such as a numerical grade or cut score. More than one type of reporting method may be used.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score possible on the assessment.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score possible on the assessment.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

academicSubjectDescriptor.description: The subject area of the objective assessment.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.OpenStaffPosition
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents an open staff position that the education organization is seeking to fill.

employmentStatusDescriptor.description: Reflects the type of employment or contract desired for the position; for example:        Probationary        Contractual        Substitute/temporary        Tenured or permanent        Volunteer/no contract        ...

staffClassificationDescriptor.description: The titles of employment, official status, or rank of education staff.

positionTitle.description: The descriptive name of an individual's position.

requisitionNumber.description: The number or identifier assigned to an open staff position, typically a requisition number assigned by Human Resources.

programAssignmentDescriptor.description: The name of the program for which the OpenStaffPosition will be assigned; for example:        Regular education        Title I-Academic        Title I-Non-Academic        Special Education'        Bilingual/English as a Second Language.

datePostingRemoved.description: The date the posting was removed or filled.

postingResultDescriptor.description: Indication of whether the OpenStaffPosition was filled or retired without filling.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

requisitionNumber.description: The number or identifier assigned to an open staff position, typically a requisition number assigned by Human Resources.

programAssignmentDescriptor.description: The name of the program for which the OpenStaffPosition will be assigned; for example:        Regular education        Title I-Academic        Title I-Non-Academic        Special Education'        Bilingual/English as a Second Language.

datePostingRemoved.description: The date the posting was removed or filled.

postingResultDescriptor.description: Indication of whether the OpenStaffPosition was filled or retired without filling.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

personalTitlePrefix.description: A prefix used to denote the title, degree, position, or seniority of the person.

postalCode.description: The five or nine digit zip code or overseas postal code portion of an address.

nameOfCounty.description: The name of the county, parish, borough, or comparable unit (within a state) in                      'which an address is located.

countyFIPSCode.description: The Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numeric code for the county issued by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). A unique county number is created when combined with the 2-digit FIPS State Code.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Payroll
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This financial entity represents the sum of the financial transactions to date for employee compensation. An "employee" who performs services under the direction of the employing institution or agency, is compensated for such services by the employer and is eligible for employee benefits and wage or salary tax withholdings.

amountToDate.description: Current balance (amount paid to employee) for account for the fiscal year.

asOfDate.description: The date of the reported payroll element.

accountIdentifier.description: The alphanumeric string that identifies the account.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.PostSecondaryEvent
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity captures significant postsecondary events during a student's high school tenure (e.g., FAFSA application or college application, acceptance, and enrollment) or during a student's enrollment at a post-secondary institution.

eventDate.description: The date the event occurred or was recorded.

postSecondaryEventCategoryDescriptor.description: The PostSecondaryEvent that is logged (e.g., FAFSA application, college application, college acceptance).

postSecondaryInstitutionId.description: The ID of the post secondary institution.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Program
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents any program designed to work in conjunction with, or as a supplement to, the main academic program. Programs may provide instruction, training, services, or benefits through federal, state, or local agencies. Programs may also include organized extracurricular activities for students.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programId.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a program by a school, school system, a state, or other agency or entity.

programName.description: The formal name of the Program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.ReportCard
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This educational entity represents the collection of student grades for courses taken during a grading period.

gradeTypeDescriptor.description: The type of grade reported (e.g., Exam, Final, Grading Period).

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

beginDate.description: Month, day, and year of the Student's entry or assignment to the Section.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

objective.description: The designated title of the CompetencyObjective.

objectiveGradeLevelDescriptor.description: The grade level for which the CompetencyObjective is targeted.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

learningObjectiveId.description: The identifier for the specific learning objective in the context of a standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: Namespace for the LearningObjective.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

gpaGivenGradingPeriod.description: A measure of average performance in all courses taken by an individual for the current grading period.

gpaCumulative.description: A measure of cumulative average performance in all courses taken by an individual from the beginning of the school year through the current grading period.

gradePointAverageTypeDescriptor.description: The system used for calculating the grade point average for an individual.

isCumulative.description: Indicator of whether or not the Grade Point Average value is cumulative.

gradePointAverageValue.description: The value of the grade points earned divided by the number of credits attempted.

maxGradePointAverageValue.description: The maximum value for the grade point average.

numberOfDaysAbsent.description: The number of days an individual is absent when school is in session during a given reporting period.

numberOfDaysInAttendance.description: The number of days an individual is present when school is in session during a given reporting period.

numberOfDaysTardy.description: The number of days an individual is tardy during a given reporting period.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for which grades are reported.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Section
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents a setting in which organized instruction of course content is provided, in-person or otherwise, to one or more students for a given period of time. A course offering may be offered to more than one section.

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

sequenceOfCourse.description: When a section is part of a sequence of parts for a course, the number of the sequence. If the course has only one part, the value of this section attribute should be 1.

educationalEnvironmentDescriptor.description: The setting in which a child receives education and related services; for example:        Center-based instruction        Home-based instruction        Hospital class        Mainstream        Residential care and treatment facility        ...

mediumOfInstructionDescriptor.description: The media through which teachers provide instruction to students and students and teachers communicate about instructional matters; for example:        Technology-based instruction in classroom        Correspondence instruction        Face-to-face instruction        Virtual/On-line Distance learning        Center-based instruction        ...

populationServedDescriptor.description: The type of students the Section is offered and tailored to; for example:        Bilingual students        Remedial education students        Gifted and talented students        Career and Technical Education students        Special education students        ...

availableCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

availableCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

availableCreditConversions.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

instructionLanguageDescriptor.description: The primary language of instruction, if omitted English is assumed.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session (e.g., 2010/11, 2011 Summer).

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

classroomIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a room by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

classPeriodName.description: An indication of the portion of a typical daily session in which students receive instruction in a specified subject (e.g., morning, sixth period, block period, or AB schedules).

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programName.description: The formal name of the Program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

officialAttendancePeriod.description: Indicator of whether this section is used for official daily attendance. Alternatively, official daily attendance may be tied to a Class Period.

sectionName.description: A locally-defined name for the section, generally created to make the section more recognizable in informal contexts and generally distinct from the SectionIdentifier.

jsonSchemaForInsert.title: Ed-Fi.Staff
jsonSchemaForInsert.description: This entity represents an individual who performs specified activities for any public or private education institution or agency that provides instructional and/or support services to students or staff at the early childhood level through high school completion. For example, this includes:    1. An "employee" who performs services under the direction of the employing institution or agency is compensated for such services by the employer and is eligible for employee benefits and wage or salary tax withholdings    2. A "contractor" or "consultant" who performs services for an agreed upon fee or an employee of a management service contracted to work on site    3. A "volunteer" who performs services on a voluntary and uncompensated basis    4. An in-kind service provider    5. An independent contractor or businessperson working at a school site.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a staff member by a school, school system, a state, or other agency or entity.

staffIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A coding scheme that is used for identification and record-keeping purposes by schools, social services, or other agencies to refer to a staff member.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the staff Identification Code.

personalTitlePrefix.description: A prefix used to denote the title, degree, position, or seniority of the person.

firstName.description: A name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony, or through legal change.

middleName.description: A secondary name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony.

lastSurname.description: The name borne in common by members of a family.

generationCodeSuffix.description: An appendage, if any, used to denote an individual's generation in his family (e.g., Jr., Sr., III).

documentTitle.description: The title of the document given by the issuer.

personalInformationVerificationDescripto.description: The category of the document relative to its purpose.

documentExpirationDate.description: The day when the document  expires, if null then never expires.

issuerDocumentIdentificationCode.description: The unique identifier on the issuer's identification system.

issuerName.description: Name of the entity or institution that issued the document.

issuerCountryDescriptor.description: Country of origin of the document. It is strongly recommended that entries use only ISO 3166 2-letter country codes.

identificationDocumentUseDescriptor.description: The primary function of the document used for establishing identity.

personalTitlePrefix.description: A prefix used to denote the title, degree, position, or seniority of the person.

firstName.description: A name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony, or through legal change.

middleName.description: A secondary name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony.

lastSurname.description: The name borne in common by members of a family.

generationCodeSuffix.description: An appendage, if any, used to denote an individual's generation in his family (e.g., Jr., Sr., III).

otherNameTypeDescriptor.description: The types of alternate names for a person.

birthDate.description: The month, day, and year on which an individual was born.

streetNumberName.description: The street number and street name or post office box number of an address.

apartmentRoomSuiteNumber.description: The apartment, room, or suite number of an address.

buildingSiteNumber.description: The number of the building on the site, if more than one building shares the same address.

city.description: The name of the city in which an address is located.

stateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the state (within the United States) or outlying area in which an address is located.

postalCode.description: The five or nine digit zip code or overseas postal code portion of an address.

nameOfCounty.description: The name of the county, parish, borough, or comparable unit (within a state) in                      'which an address is located.

countyFIPSCode.description: The Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numeric code for the county issued by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Counties are considered to be the "first-order subdivisions" of each State and statistically equivalent entity, regardless of their local designations (county, parish, borough, etc.) Counties in different States will have the same code. A unique county number is created when combined with the 2-digit FIPS State Code.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year for the start of the period.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization.    For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the address should not be published.

congressionalDistrict.description: The congressional district in which an address is located.

localeDescriptor.description: A general geographic indicator that categorizes U.S. territory (e.g., City, Suburban).

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization. For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address.

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address.

addressLine4.description: The fourth line of the address.

countryDescriptor.description: The name of the country. It is strongly recommended that entries use only ISO 3166 2-letter country codes.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

beginDate.description: The first date the address is valid. For physical addresses, the date the person moved to that address.

endDate.description: The last date the address is valid. For physical addresses, this would be the date the person moved from that address.

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number including the area code, and extension, if applicable.

telephoneNumberTypeDescriptor.description: The type of communication number listed for an individual or organization.

orderOfPriority.description: The order of priority assigned to telephone numbers to define which number to attempt first, second, etc.

textMessageCapabilityIndicator.description: An indication that the telephone number is technically capable of sending and receiving Short Message Service (SMS) text messages.

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the telephone number should not be published.

electronicMailAddress.description: The electronic mail (e-mail) address listed for an individual or organization.

electronicMailTypeDescriptor.description: The type of email listed for an individual or organization. For example: Home/Personal, Work, etc.)

primaryEmailAddressIndicator.description: An indication that the electronic mail address should be used as the principal electronic mail address for an individual or organization.

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the electronic email address should not be published.

hispanicLatinoEthnicity.description: An indication that the individual traces his or her origin or descent to Mexico, Puerto Rico, Cuba, Central, and South America, and other Spanish cultures, regardless of race. The term, "Spanish origin," can be used in addition to "Hispanic or Latino."

oldEthnicityDescriptor.description: Previous definition of Ethnicity combining Hispanic/Latino and race:        1 - American Indian or Alaskan Native        2 - Asian or Pacific Islander        3 - Black, not of Hispanic origin        4 - Hispanic        5 - White, not of Hispanic origin.

citizenshipStatusDescriptor.description: An indicator of whether or not the person is a U.S. citizen.

documentTitle.description: The title of the document given by the issuer.

personalInformationVerificationDescripto.description: The category of the document relative to its purpose.

documentExpirationDate.description: The day when the document  expires, if null then never expires.

issuerDocumentIdentificationCode.description: The unique identifier on the issuer's identification system.

issuerName.description: Name of the entity or institution that issued the document.

issuerCountryDescriptor.description: Country of origin of the document. It is strongly recommended that entries use only ISO 3166 2-letter country codes.

identificationDocumentUseDescriptor.description: The primary function of the document used for establishing identity.

languageDescriptor.description: A specification of which written or spoken communication is being used.

highestCompletedLevelOfEducationDescript.description: The extent of formal instruction an individual has received (e.g., the highest grade in school completed or its equivalent or the highest degree received).

yearsOfPriorProfessionalExperience.description: The total number of years that an individual has previously held a similar professional position in one or more education institutions.

yearsOfPriorTeachingExperience.description: The total number of years that an individual has previously held a teaching position in one or more education institutions.

loginId.description: The login ID for the user; used for security access control interface.

highlyQualifiedTeacher.description: An indication of whether a teacher is classified as highly qualified for his/her assignment according to state definition. This attribute indicates the teacher is highly qualified for ALL Sections being taught.

achievementTitle.description: The title assigned to the achievement.

achievementCategoryDescriptor.description: The category of achievement attributed to the learner.

achievementCategorySystem.description: The system that defines the categories by which an achievement is attributed to the learner.

issuerName.description: The name of the agent, entity, or institution issuing the element.

issuerOriginURL.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) from which the award was issued.

criteria.description: The criteria for competency-based completion of the achievement/award.

criteriaURL.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) for the unique address of a web page describing the competency-based completion criteria for the achievement/award.

evidenceStatement.description: A statement or reference describing the evidence that the learner met the criteria for attainment of the Achievement.

imageURL.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) for the unique address of an image representing an award or badge associated with the Achievement.

recognitionTypeDescriptor.description: The nature of recognition given to the learner for accomplishments in a co-curricular, or extra-curricular activity.

recognitionDescription.description: A description of the type of academic distinctions earned by or awarded to the individual.

recognitionAwardDate.description: The date the recognition was awarded or earned.

recognitionAwardExpiresDate.description: Date on which the award expires.

credentialIdentifier.description: Identifier or serial number assigned to the credential.

stateOfIssueStateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the name of the state (within the United States) or extra-state jurisdiction in which a license/credential was issued.

personId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a person.

sourceSystemDescriptor.description: This descriptor defines the originating record source system for the person.

A "contractor" or "consultant" who performs services for an agreed upon fee or an employee of a management service contracted to work on site    3. A "volunteer" who performs services on a voluntary and uncompensated basis    4. An in-kind service provider    5. An independent contractor or businessperson working at a school site.

criteria.description: The criteria for competency-based completion of the achievement/award.
